instruction: Faça a o converção desse script do IBM RPA para Python
input:
defVar --name lettersCollection --type List --innertype String --value "[A,B,C,D,E,F,H,I,J,K,L,M]"
insert --index 7 --value G --collection "${lettersCollection}"
logMessage --message "${lettersCollection}" --type "Info"

output:
numeric_list = []
numeric_list.append(25)
numeric_list.append(10)
numeric_list.append(98)
numeric_list.insert(0, 0)
numeric_list.append(45)
numeric_list.append(1)
numeric_list.insert(3, -5)
numeric_list.insert(4, 108)

sum = 0
for number in numeric_list:
    sum += number

instruction: Converta para Python o código do IBM RPA a seguir
input:
defVar --name studentAverage --type Numeric --value 8
if --left "${studentAverage}" --operator "Greater_Than" --right 7
    logMessage --message "Congratulations! You can participate in the draw!" --type Info
endIf

instruction: Converta o script a seguir para python
input:
defVar --name studentAverage --type Numeric --value 7.5
if --left "${studentAverage}" --operator "Equal_To" --right 10
    logMessage --message "Congratulations! You have been approved for the Advanced Mathematics course with a perfect score!" --type Info
elseIf --left "${studentAverage}" --operator "Greater_Than" --right 7
    logMessage --message "Congratulations! You have been approved for the Advanced Mathematics course!" --type Info
else
    logMessage --message "Unfortunately, you were not approved for the Advanced Mathematics course, your grade is below the cut-off mark." --type Info
